verbs.description: he [V: was] charged with the shooting death of sebastian auto shop owner james malone in april the man who spent five days on the run after escaping from jail in october was sentenced to three life terms when he pleaded no contest to several crimes including second - degree murder shortly rondell reed sebastian james malone
